Ms. MURKOWSKI. Mr. President, we will soon have a voice vote on a  motion to adjourn the Senate until next week. Had there been a recorded  rollcall vote on that motion, I would have…
Ms. MURKOWSKI. Mr. President, as we are starting this new year, there  is certainly no shortage of issues to be talking about. You and I have  been engaged in fruitful discussions, I…
Ms. MURKOWSKI. Mr. President, I understand that there is a bill at  the desk, and I ask for its first reading.
